title.text: Rocky beaches in the Kingston region

marker.label: Richardson Beach
marker.comment: This is where many of Kingstons best windsurfers launch thair boards on windy days.

marker.label: Everitt Point Park
marker.comment: Beautiful waterfront park with a gorgeous flat-rock surface that, depending on water levels, you can venture out and sit upon, surrounded by crashing water in a breeze.

marker.label: Patterson Park Beach
marker.comment: Flat-rock swimming area. Big waves in a breeze. Good windsurfing break too.
